name: castle_game
description:
Unfinished!

Currently the game is only playable until you reach the key in the courtyard! The rest of the game is still in development!

A short Pico-8 action-platformer based on classic Castlevania. v0.1 was made in a weekend for the uToronto GDDC Winter Game Jam. v1.0 will be released in the distant future.
